message:
CONVERSATION 1
Her: no my dad actually got the call. and the owner was like... "aapke ek guest ne hamare bathroom ka geyser chura liya".
Him: lmao, imagine getting heated over a heater. next time we'll just swipe the sink to cool off the situation.

CONVERSATION 2
Her: no my dad actually got the call. and the owner was like... "aapke ek guest ne hamare bathroom ka geyser chura liya".
Him: bruh, stealing the spotlight? more like stealing the hotlight. guess we're too cool for legal hot water now.

CONVERSATION 3
Her: no my dad actually got the call. and the owner was like... "aapke ek guest ne hamare bathroom ka geyser chura liya".
Him: yo, that's some hot property crime right there. should've taken the toilet too, go big or go home, amirite?

CONVERSATION 4
Her: no my dad actually got the call. and the owner was like... "aapke ek guest ne hamare bathroom ka geyser chura liya".
Him: damn, geyser heist? that's some next-level hot pursuit. cops be like 'freeze!', irony much?

CONVERSATION 5
Her: no my dad actually got the call. and the owner was like... "aapke ek guest ne hamare bathroom ka geyser chura liya".
Him: well, that's one way to make a splash. stealing a geyser? hope they left the tap for evidence, lol.
prompt:
I'm creating an AI bot designed to help teenage guys talk to girls. I need you to generate some conversations.

        Here is the sample conversation-

        Her : incredibly sagacious person. 
        Him : yes yes yes. totally.

        An example of a valid answers for this convesation would be-

        CONVERSATION 1
        Her : im super wise wtf
        Him : of course, Socrates ;)
        ,

        CONVERSATION 2
        Her : im so smart
        Him : does that mean that our children will be intelligent baby  ;)

        I emphasis this again - the messages from 'her' and 'him' must have the same theme as the prompt. They must be funny, witty and charming. They must be sexy and attractive. The conversations must be in Gen Z slang. lmao, lol, cringe and cap would be appreciated. Make them as sarcastic as possible.

        I need 5 conversations like this, with unique messages for her and him.

        Here is your prompt. 
        Her : Her : no my dad actually got the call. and the owner was like... " aapke ek guest ne hamare bathroom ka geyser chura liya".  
        Him : Him : ........ wtf. if i were the owner id be like. wtf why'd ya steal my geyser you bitches give it back. did the owner call the cops?. *police. ahdjdjsjsksksk british english. 

        Your Conversations must be of the format :
        CONVERSATION
        Her : 'message'
        Him : 'message'.

        I want just the conversations. No filler messages or content which AI usually gives.

        Thanks bro.
